## For New Skills

If submitting a new skill, please confirm:

- [ ] `skill.json` is valid and complete
- [ ] `README.md` includes all required sections
- [ ] Entrypoint file exists and is functional
- [ ] No secrets or credentials included
- [ ] Tested on at least one platform
- [ ] Ran `python scripts/validate_skill.py skills/YourSkillName` successfully
